articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Deutsche Bank’s Analysis of Q4 2025 Deliveries Drives Tesla (TSLA) Price Target Hike. Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) is one of the best high volume stocks to buy right now. On December 19, Deutsche Bank raised the firm’s price target on Tesla to $500 from $470 with a Buy rating on the shares. articles.title: Truist Financial (TFC): Reassessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
articles.mainIdea: Truist Financial (TFC): Reassessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Truist Financial (TFC): Reassessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum. Truist Financial (TFC) has quietly been grinding higher, and recent returns suggest investors are warming back up to this regional banking heavyweight as credit fears ease and revenue growth stabilizes. See our latest analysis for Truist Financial. That steady climb has added up, with an 11.5% 1 month share price return, a 17.1% year to date share price return, and a 21.0% 1 year total shareholder return showing momentum is clearly building as investors reassess regional bank risk.
